activityCount.context: number of activities in the collection

changeImage.context: Change the decorative image of an item

closed.context: This item has been closed. You can longer access this item

completed.context: The user has done everything for this item.

completedDaysAgo.context: The item was completed x number of days ago in the past.

completedOn.context: The date at which this item was completed. The date is in the past.

completedTomorrow.context: This item was completed tomorrow. In the future.

continue.context: Continue an item where you left off.

continueToModule.context: Continue a course by going to the next module.

courseOfferingInformation.context: Go to the settings page for a course offering information

coursePinButton.context: This course is pinned and will be at the top of the list. Click here to unpin the course.

description.context: A description of an item. A course mainly

disabled.context: This course is current not accessible to the user.

dueDaysAgo.context: This course needs to be done and was expected to be done x days ago

dueOn.context: This course needs to be finished at a future time.

dueToday.context: This course needs to be finished today.

dueTomorrow.context: this course needs to be done tomorrow

dueYesterday.context: The course needs to be done and was expected to be done yesterday

ended.context: This course has ended sometime in the past.
ended.translation: Wedi dod i ben ar {date} am {time}

endsAt.context: This course will end in a future time.
endsAt.translation: Yn dod i ben ar {date} am {time}

enrollmentProgressBar.context: How many things have you completed in the current item

inactive.context: This item is currenlty not accessible to the user.

new.context: The user has never entered into the course.

noCoursesMessage.context: The message that is displayed when a user has no courses or Learning Paths assigned to them.
noCoursesMessage.translation: Does gennych chi ddim cyrsiau na llwybrau dysgu i’w dangos.

overdue.context: The user is expected to finish this course in the past.

pin.context: Action to make this course show up first in the list of courses

pinActionResult.context: This course has just taken the action to be pin

startsAt.context: The course starts at a future date

unpin.context: Action: Stop the course from showing up first in the list of courses

unpinActionResult.context: Response from the Unpin action verifying that this action has been taken place.

viewAllLearning.context: The button text linking the user to the My Learning page to view all of their Learning items
